name: Calling Hello Neighbor Scary
description:
I thought I would share my hello neighbor knowledge in this fun and unique UNOFFICIAL call game!
Do you love hello neighbor ?
Do you want to make a call with hello neighbor ? You're in the right Place!, including call Scary hello Neighbor alpha4 talk now and show a friend,
he will be very surprised! Share close.
You can't made a real call, but what inside the app seems like you will made a call with the scary hello neighbor !!! We hope you like it :) Disclaimer : You can't make a real call, this is just a prank App!
